paramInformation.label: Current Threshold
paramInformation.description: When detected current is above threshold, relay turns off and sends notification. Allowable range: 0, 5-16

paramInformation.label: Recover Settings
paramInformation.description: Recover settings after power loss / power reset.

paramInformation.label: High Temperature Threshold
paramInformation.description: Turns off relay and sends notification if temperature is above threshold. Allowable range: 0, 20-60

paramInformation.label: Energy Save Mode
paramInformation.description: 0 - Off, user schedule used. 1 - On, use Energy_Save_Heating temperature set by THERMOSTAT_SETPOINT_SET

paramInformation.label: Room Temperature Correction
paramInformation.description: Correct room temperature sensor. Allowable range: -10 - 10

paramInformation.label: Floor Temperature Correction
paramInformation.description: Correct floor temperature sensor. Allowable range: -10 - 10

paramInformation.label: Mode After Drying
paramInformation.description: Set the mode after drying mode completes.

paramInformation.label: Temperature Report on Value
paramInformation.description: When to report temperature relative change actively. Allowable range: 0 (disable), 2-10

paramInformation.label: Temperature Report on Interval
paramInformation.description: Time interval to report temperature. Allowable range: 0 (disable), 30-28800

paramInformation.label: Power Change Threshold
paramInformation.description: Threshold when to report power change. Allowable range: 0 (disable), 1-100

paramInformation.label: Current Change Threshold
paramInformation.description: Threshold when to report current change. Allowable range: 0 (disable), 1-10

paramInformation.label: Voltage Change Threshold
paramInformation.description: Threshold when to report voltage change. Allowable range: 0 (disable), 1-10

paramInformation.label: Meter Report Interval
paramInformation.description: Time interval for active report of Meter. Allowable range: 60-2678400

paramInformation.label: Timezone
paramInformation.description: The timezone that the parameters command adopts is UTC, the timezone need to be set. Allowable range: -12 - 12
